!Tablet of Vision: Countless thoughts beyond comprehension sear painfully into your brain. In a mesmerizing revelation you realize that this isn't the only Stone of Commune nor Tablet of Vision! The knowledge contained in these tablets could change the world!%% As the pain subsides, a strange vision appears before you. A creature with four white wings, flying above the Valley of Saints, is carrying the Stone of Commune! In a moment, the vision fades...%% The tablet goes still and dark, as if nothing had happened. Go to* the south of the Valley of Saints* and find the Tablet of Vision!
